Title: In Memory of Me
Writer: Saverio Costanzo (story and screenplay), Flaminia Morandi (screenplay), Furio Monicelli (novel), Matteo D'Arienzo (screenplay)
Actors: Christo Jivkov, Filippo Timi, Marco Baliani, André Hennicke
Plot: Andrea is an intelligent, handsome young man who seems to have everything necessary to succeed. But the worlds infinite possibilities have only confused him...
